description.translate: Graceful, her elegance shines through and punishes the villain.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9La dame des bois\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Gracieuse, son élégance rayonne\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et châtie le vilain.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Graceful, her elegance shines through\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and punishes the villain.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7SPD§a1 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
